mapper.update: update IM_DEVELOP_ACCOUNT set SERVER_IP = #{serverIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVER_PORT = #{serverPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SOFTVERSION = #{softversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BASEURL = #{baseurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_SID = #{accountSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTH_TOKEN = #{authToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_TOKEN = #{appToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISABLED = #{disabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SERVER_IP, SERVER_PORT, SOFTVERSION, BASEURL, ACCOUNT_SID, AUTH_TOKEN, APP_ID, APP_TOKEN, MEMO, STATUS, DISABLED from IM_DEVELOP_ACCOUNT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SERVER_IP, SERVER_PORT, SOFTVERSION, BASEURL, ACCOUNT_SID, AUTH_TOKEN, APP_ID, APP_TOKEN, MEMO, STATUS, DISABLED from IM_DEVELOP_ACCOUNT
select ID, SERVER_IP, SERVER_PORT, SOFTVERSION, BASEURL, ACCOUNT_SID, AUTH_TOKEN, APP_ID, APP_TOKEN, MEMO, STATUS, DISABLED from IM_DEVELOP_ACCOUNT WHERE STATUS = 1
